item.title: Eternals
item.description:
That’s a fascinating movie.

Ancient aliens sent to Earth thousands of years ago to protect1 humanity… but only from very specific threats. Loki and the Chitauri? Nah. Hydra? Nope. Thanos? Of course not. A whole cast of superheroes2 and we’ve never seen them before3–and I doubt that any of the should-be-worldwide-news events in this film will make it into any of the others.

If you ignore all that though, it’s an interesting enough idea, especially once you start digging into the greater cosmic plot. There’s even more to unpack than we even get a chance to look at in that movie. I really do want to know where it goes next–and if there will be any impact at all on the greater MCU.
